page.title: 10Housing Estate, Hollington
page.content: In 1948 they began to build a{council {estate,}near the old village of Hollington.It is quite a big estate, and our school is on the edge of it.Some houses are terraced,some are semi-detached. Coventry Rd. Bristol Rd.and Oxford Rd.were named after cities bombed in the second World War. Other roads were named after important people. There are five{shops}in Blackman Avenue for local people to use; there are several{play areas}for the children.Some people have bought their house,and have made it look very smart.Half the children in our school live on the estate. Gary lives in one of the 4 blocks of {flats}called Bevin Court which was built about 1965.It has 14 floors,6 flats on each floor.There are two lifts.There is a security system and everyone has a special key.
